author: Dr Ben Miles
description:
Scientists have combined synthetic DNA with magnetic cassette tapes to create an ultra-dense, durable data storage medium capable of holding up to 362 petabytes per kilometer. This new system enables multi-cycle data retrieval with high fidelity and could revolutionize sustainable long-term data archiving. 

Source Article: https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC12422178/

title: Scientists Create DNA Tape To Store Every Song Ever Recorded
